since he left the show.`` I haven't seen a full episode,'' the former Idol judge told reporters on a conference call for his upcoming music competition series, The X-Factor. I've seen three minutes of a recap. From what I've seen and from what I've heard, it all seems to be going well. What I was more concerned about the ratings falling off a cliff, and that the whole genre might be over. But people are still excited about these shows, whether Dancing With the Stars, which has gotten better over the years, America's Got Talent... I think they've done a good job.
